name: Radiant Historia
description:
Radiant Historia is a RPG game developed by Atlus. It came out on 22-02-2011. Atlus published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Radiant Historia is available on Nintendo DS.
Mitsuru Hirata and Satoshi Takayashiki directed the game. It was scored by Yoko Shimomura.
